trends: There has been one other sighting in Marquette Township
There were no other sightings in Marquette Township on or around July 8th 1968
divs: Sighting DetailsWell it has taken me 40 some years to tell anyone,( with the expeption of a few friends over the years) When I was 5 or 6 years old I was Sleeping in Bed and awoke to, Well I don't know what woke me but I looked out my bedroom window and noticed a Good sized grey head with black eyes, Looking in at me, I remember not being scared at the time, But after I looked for awhile I don't know how long it was, Cuz I was only a young boy, So when it was gone I did get scared and ran out to the living room and told my mother something was looking in my window and it was a Monster, Both Mother and father told my I had a nightmare, But for some reason I didn't believe them and was quite scared Still,And I was listing to both of them say it was from watching Captain Kangaroo, and it was probably Rolo, I was happy to hear that at the time, But as my life went on I knew it wasn't what they had thought it was a nightmare, Me only being 5 or 6 years of age would not know what an alien looks like or every heard of one, So Like I say as time went by and I got older and heard of then things (aliens) my mind was made up about what I had seen, I have only told very few people about what I seen and they probably think I am crazy but Somethning happend that night, I know something was watching me or at least looking in at me, I Have always had a strong Beleif there is something out there. Anyways thats what I encounterd in my life and would like to share it, Its Time to except what I seen, 1968 or 1969 it was summer, I have seen other things in the air, strange lights other occurances also, But they could be explained somewhat enugh to satify me, Like satelites, metors so on, But what I seen when I had no idea about aliens , Is amazing to me, So if someone else has had anything like that happen don't feel alone I am sure it happens all the time..... Thanks for reading.
Summary: I didn't see a UFO but I did see a entity Looking in my window
